landing-page.title: AppAgent
landing-page.tagline: From ASO to Release, All Streamlined
landing-page.description: AppAgent automates ASO while simplifying every step from planning to release. Effortlessly generate multilingual release notes, track growth, and handle updatesâ€”all in one place.
landing-page.your-browser-does-not-support-the-video-: Your browser does not support the video tag.
landing-page.reason-one: Thanks to rapid AI advancements, creating an app has never been easier. Yet popular ASO tools (App Radar, AppTweak, Sensor Tower, etc.) remain prohibitively expensive and unnecessarily complex for indie developers and small teams. What's truly needed is a platform that autonomously handles everythingâ€”from multilingual keyword selection to ASO content generationâ€”streamlining not just keywords, but the entire release process.
landing-page.reason-two: App Store Connect also introduced friction into the release workflow. That's why I took an AI-first approach and built AppAgent from the ground up, reimagining how ASO and app releases should work together in one seamless, efficient platform.
landing-page.key-features-description: Automate your app's ASO, streamline keyword research, and optimize listings globallyâ€”all without breaking the bank.
landing-page.open-source-description: I believe in a community-driven approach. AppAgent's code is open for all to see, and you can host it yourself. Your trust matters, and open source fosters that trustâ€”anyone can contribute, audit, and improve.
landing-page.open-source-community-driven-description: Suggest features, fix bugs, and help shape the roadmap. Together, we build better tools.
landing-page.open-source-transparent-description: Your trust matters, and open source fosters that trustâ€”anyone can contribute, audit, and improve.
landing-page.open-source-full-data-ownership-descript: Worried about your data? AppAgent is open source, so you can host it yourself and have full ownership of your data.
landing-page.clone-the-repo: Clone the repo and get started
landing-page.pricing-description: Your support helps keep AppAgent improving and up-to-date. Please try it out for free for one week without a credit card.
landing-page.just-sign-up-and-start-optimizing: One week free trial (no credit card required)
landing-page.ready-to-try-appagent-description: Try an AI-first ASO platform that's actually a complete app management solution.
landing-page.global-product-description: Ideal for app publishers managing multiple international markets who need efficient localization and optimization across various regions.
landing-page.hands-off-aso-description: Perfect for those seeking to automate their ASO strategy without delving into detailed keyword research and optimization.
landing-page.automated-updates-description: Designed for anyone tired of manually updating fields, like What's New sections, across multiple locales in App Store Connect for each release.
landing-page.perfect-fit-description: AppAgent caters to those who prefer automation and efficiency across global markets over intensive, market-specific ASO. Our focus is on streamlining your app management so you can focus on your product.
landing-page.aso-focus-description: You need a tool that excels at ASO for English markets alone. AppAgent is built for global reach, not market-specific optimization.

cancel-plan.title: Your AppAgent subscription has been canceled
cancel-plan.description: This email confirms that your AppAgent subscription has been canceled. Your subscription benefits will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
cancel-plan.message: I'm sad to see you go. If you'd like to share any feedback about your experience with AppAgent, please feel free to reply to this email. Your input helps me improve AppAgent.

upgrade-plan.title: Thank you for upgrading your AppAgent planðŸŽ‰
upgrade-plan.description: My name is Shu, and I'm the creator of AppAgent. I wanted to personally reach out to thank you for upgrading your AppAgent plan!
upgrade-plan.message: AppAgent is a bootstrapped and open-source business. Your support means the world to me and helps me continue to build and improve AppAgent.

verification-link.title: Login to your AppAgent account with a link
verification-link.description: Please click the magic link below to sign in to your account.
verification-link.or-copy-and-paste-this-url-into-your-bro: or copy and paste this URL into your browser:

welcome.title: Welcome to AppAgent
welcome.description: Thanks for signing up{name}! My name is Shu, and I'm the creator of AppAgent â€“ an open-source AppStore Optimization (ASO) tool! I'm excited to have you on board!
welcome.message: I built this tool because I noticed that existing ASO solutions like App Radar and Sensor Tower, while powerful, can be overwhelming for indie developers. I wanted to create something simpler - a tool that just works without expertise or time dedication.
welcome.get-started: Here are a few things you can do to get started:
welcome.upload-your-app-store-connect-api-key: Upload your App Store Connect API key

common.title: AppAgent
common.questions: If you have any questions, just respond to this email. I'm always happy to help!

login.title: {{appName}}
login.description: From ASO to Release, All Streamlined

plan.title: Upgrade {{appName}}
plan.description: Let us handle app management from ASO to release for just $29/month
plan.payment-canceled: Payment canceled. Please try again when you're ready.
plan.failed-to-create-checkout-session: Failed to create checkout session. Please try again.
plan.your-payment-was-successful: Your payment was successful. You can now start using all features.
plan.support-appagent-open-source-journey-two: Your $29/month subscription helps us maintain and improve the project.
plan.already-subscribed: You are already subscribed to the Pro plan.

localization.title: Title
localization.subtitle: Subtitle
localization.release-notes-placeholder: Enter a rough draft of release notes in your primary language. We will refine it for each locale.
localization.add-new-locale-description: Adding a new locale will save all current changes in editing status. Select a locale to add to your app's information.
localization.screenshots-note: Note: Currently, screenshots from your primary locale will be used. We're doing research on AI-powered screenshot generation for each locale.
localization.agreement-required-description: Please visit App Store Connect to review and accept the latest agreement before continuing.
localization.agreement-required-note: Note: After accepting the agreement, it may take up to 5 minutes before AppAgent can access your account.
localization.no-apps-found: No apps found in App Store Connect.
localization.create-new-version-description: Your current version is published. Create a new version to make changes.
localization.version-will-be-created-as-a-draft: Version will be created as a draft. You can edit it later.
localization.failed-to-save-changes: Failed to save changes on AppAgent. Please try again.
localization.latest-version-pulled-successfully: Latest version pulled from App Store Connect successfully
localization.failed-to-pull-latest-version: Failed to pull latest version from App Store Connect. Please try again.
localization.changes-pushed-successfully: Changes pushed to App Store Connect successfully
localization.failed-to-push-changes: Failed to push changes to App Store Connect. Please try again.
localization.version-cannot-be-empty: Version cannot be empty. Please enter a valid version number.
localization.version-already-exists: The specified version already exists on App Store Connect. Please try a different version number.
localization.new-version-created-successfully: New version created on App Store Connect successfully
localization.failed-to-create-new-version: Failed to create the new version on App Store Connect. Please try again.
localization.to-get-started-connect-your-store-accoun: To get started, connect your App Store Connect account
localization.error-loading-localizations: Error loading localizations. Please try again.
localization.pull-latest-version-from-app-store-conne: Pull latest version from App Store Connect
localization.save-changes-locally: Save changes on AppAgent (not on App Store Connect)
localization.push-changes-to-app-store-connect: Push the saved changes to App Store Connect
localization.pull-latest-version-description: This action will fetch the latest version from App Store Connect. Any differences from App Store Connect in your current version will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
localization.push-changes-to-app-store-connect-title: Push Changes to App Store Connect
localization.push-changes-to-app-store-connect-descri: This action will push your changes to App Store Connect. This will update the metadata that appears on the App Store. Are you sure you want to continue?
localization.upload-app-store-connect-api-key: Upload App Store Connect API Key
localization.how-to-generate-an-api-key: How to Generate an API Key
localization.how-to-generate-an-api-key-description: App Store Connect API keys are used to authenticate your requests to the App Store Connect API. They are required to perform certain actions, such as creating and managing App Store Connect resources. To generate an API key, follow these steps:
localization.log-in-to-app-store-connect: Log in to App Store Connect (You must be Admin)
localization.select-users-and-access: Select Users and Access, then select the API Keys tab
localization.make-sure-the-team-keys-tab-is-selected: Make sure the Team Keys tab is selected
localization.click-generate-api-key-or-the-add-button: Click Generate API Key or the Add (+) button
localization.enter-a-name-for-the-key: Enter a name for the key (for reference only)
localization.select-the-key-permissions: Under Access, select App Manager role for the key
localization.copy-the-key-id-and-key-secret: The key ID, issuer ID, and a download link for the private key (.p8) will be provided. Make sure to download and safely store your private key as it cannot be downloaded again.
localization.key-id-error: Key ID must be 10 characters long
localization.issuer-id-error: Issuer ID must be a valid UUID
localization.drag-and-drop-your-p8-file-here: Drag and drop your .p8 file here
localization.localizations-not-configured: There are no localizations configured for this app yet. Add your first localization to get started.
localization.reject-notice: Visit App Store Connect to review and resolve the issue
localization.version-not-up-to-date: The version you are viewing is not up to date with App Store Connect.
localization.add-more-locales-message: Adding more language support can significantly increase your app's visibility and downloads in global markets. Consider adding more languages to maximize your app's exposure.

submit.title: Release to App Store
submit.description: Select a build to release to App Store
submit.failed-to-load-builds: Failed to load builds. Please try again.
submit.warning: Warning: You need to add 'App Uses Non-Exempt Encryption' in Info.plist to proceed with the submission.
submit.success: Successfully submitted for review. Let's wait for App Store review.
submit.error: Error occurred while submitting for review. You may need to visit App Store Connect to submit manually.

import.step-three-report-permissions: View app information and download bulk reports
import.step-three-financial-data-permissions: View financial data, orders, and cancellation survey responses

event-titles.competitor-apps-filtered-by-description: Competitor Apps Filtered by Brief Description

aso.processing-in-progress: In progress... It may take a few minutes.
aso.brief-app-description-placeholder: Enter a one-line description of your app. Ideally, focus on the app's unique features.
aso.brief-app-description-help: This will help us provide better keyword suggestions for your app.
aso.brief-app-description-help-2: Highlight the app's features and benefits.

account.account-settings-description: Manage your account settings and preferences
account.title: Account Information
account.delete-account-description: Delete your account and all associated data. This action is irreversible and will remove all your data from our system. Your account will be permanently deleted and you will not be able to recover it.
account.delete-account-are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account.delete-account-warning: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and will remove all your data from our system. Your account will be permanently deleted and you will not be able to recover it.
account.delete-account-subscription-active: To delete your account, you must first cancel your paid plan.

autonomous-keyword-research.title: Autonomous Keyword Research
autonomous-keyword-research.description: AI-driven keywords that help you get discovered effortlessly regardless of locales and markets.
autonomous-keyword-research.details-2: Run autonomously, regardless of locales and markets.
autonomous-keyword-research.details-3: Save hours each week and stay ahead of competitors.

ai-powered-store-optimization.title: AI-Powered Store Optimization
ai-powered-store-optimization.description: Generate compelling titles, subtitles, and descriptions for whatever language you want.
ai-powered-store-optimization.details-1: Instant suggestions based on your app's metadata.
ai-powered-store-optimization.details-2: ASO friendly contents generation for all languages.
ai-powered-store-optimization.details-3: No expert-level marketing needed, just click and go.

store-synchronization.title: Store Synchronization
store-synchronization.description: No more hassle to edit your app on App Store Connect. AppAgent handles it all. Google Play is coming soon.
store-synchronization.details-1: Integrated with App Store Connect, so no more manual input on App Store Connect.
store-synchronization.details-2: No more manual translation for each locale.
store-synchronization.details-3: Expand to new markets in minutes, not hours.
store-synchronization.details-4: Grow your user base internationally, hassle-free.

keyword-tracking-self-healing.title: Keyword Tracking + Self Healing
keyword-tracking-self-healing.description: Proactive keyword monitoring that suggests optimizations when needed, without you having to analyze charts.
keyword-tracking-self-healing.details-1: Continuous keyword ranking monitoring across all markets
keyword-tracking-self-healing.details-2: Proactive optimization suggestions based on performance
keyword-tracking-self-healing.details-3: No manual analysis needed - just approve or reject AI suggestions
keyword-tracking-self-healing.details-4: Self-healing ASO that adapts to market changes automatically
